content: this easy stitch is perfect for an afghan or blanket it is just sets of 3 stitches one single_crochet and two doubles once you get into the hang of it you can do it in your sleep use it for a baby blanket in a pretty pink or blue or for a regular afghan with bright colors you can change colors after a few row for a multicolored effect the photo above is a baby blanket i am working on for charity i am using a j-hook for this with worsted yarn decide how wide you want your blanket to be and chain the proper number in multiples of 3 i chained 108 for this blanket and it is about 31 inches wide for another blanket pattern using a similar stitch click here oh and by the way feel free to try this stitch on a scarf if you want experiment
